attributes.additional_details: Further to the news of Omar Bakri Mohammad family requesting Asylum in the UK I would like to take this opportunity in requesting as a British National with no political ties to request that this Government does not grant this person Asylum as this person has stated that he does not believe in the law of this land and is well known to be linked to terrorism I along with the people on this petition would like to declare as law abiding citizens the we insist that the Home Office declines this request  for the peace and safety of this country and its citizens
